anya-e1206n0:38_1: Tassa mahiyaṅgaṇa mahā vihārassa pariyantagāmake selābhayo nāma khattiyo paṭivasanto puttaṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e1206n0:38_2: aṅgalakkhaṇapāṭhakānaṃ dassesi te tassa kumārassa aṅgalakkhaṇāni oloketvā “ayaṃ kumāro khamakasatto nahoti.
anya-e1206n0:38_4: sakalampi sīhaḷadīpaṃ ekacchattaṃ karitvā mahantamahantāni acchariyabbhutāni mahāvīracaritāni dassessatī”ti vyākariṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:39_1: Tato selābhaya khattiyo puttassa abhisekādisampattiṃ sutvā koṭippattapamodaparavasopi tasmiṃ kāle anurādhapure
anya-e1206n0:39_2: rajjaṃ kārayatā “vohāratissamahārājato kadāci keci upaddavo jāyissatīti.
anya-e1206n0:39_3: Jātaparisaṅkotaṃ kumāramādāya mahiyaṅgaṇamahāvihāre bodhi aṅgaṇe parittagge sannipatitassa naṇdamahātherapamukhassa
anya-e1206n0:39_4: mahābhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nipajjāpetvā “eso me bhante kumāro mahāsaṅghassa ca mahā bodhipādassa ca
anya-e1206n0:39_5: saraṇaṃ gacchati taṃ sabbepi bhadantā rakkhantu saṅghabodhi nāmako cāyaṃ hotu”ti mahāsaṅghassa ca bodhi
anya-e1206n0:39_6: devatāya ca niyyādetvā paṭijagganto kumārassa sattavassika kāle kālamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:40_1: Atha mātulo naṇdamahāthero kumārakaṃ vihāramānetvā paṭijagganto tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā bāhirasatthesu ca paramakocidaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1206n0:40_2: Saṅghabodhikumāropi katādhikārattā tikkhapaññattā ca ñāṇaviññāṇasampanno hutvā vayappatto lokassa locanehinipiyamānāya
anya-e1206n0:40_3: rūpasampattiyā savañjalipuṭehi assādiyamānasadācāraguṇa sampattiyā ca pattha ṭa yasoghoso ahosi.

anya-e1206n0:41_8: niccā sīnakamalā kamalato rattakomaḷadalasiraṃ caraṇayugaḷe ādāya yojayatā pāramitādhammasippitā nimmitassa
anya-e1206n0:53_1: Athekadā mātulamahātherā vayappattaṃ sirisaṅghabodhi kumāraṃ dhammasavanāvasāne āmantetvā evamāha,
anya-e1206n0:53_8: amānusaṃ balañceti mahatīya balavanaṇtha paramparā’sabbāavinayāna mekekampi tesamāyatanaṃ kimuta samavāyo?“Yebhuyyena
anya-e1206n0:53_11: apaharati ca vātamaṇḍali keva sukkhapaṇṇaṃ ubabhutarajo bhanti atidūramattano icchāya yobbanasamaye purisaṃ pakati.
anya-e1206n0:53_12: Iṇdriyabhariṇabhārinī sattamatidurantāya mupabhogamigataṇahikā tasmā ayamevānassādita visaya rasassa te kālo gurupadesassa.
anya-e1206n0:53_13: Madanasarappabhārajajjarite hadaye jalamiva galati gurūnamanussānaṃ akāraṇaṃchavati duppakati no kulaṃvā
anya-e1206n0:53_14: sutaṃ vā manayassa vaṇdanappabhavonadahati kiṃ dahano?
anya-e1206n0:54_1: Apagatamale hi manasi elikamaṇimhi viya rajanikaramayukhāpavisanti,
anya-e1206n0:54_3: guruvacanamamalampi salilamiva mahantaṃ jānimupajanayati savanahataṃ sūlamiva abhabbassa,
anya-e1206n0:54_6: tasmā rāja kumārānañca yatīnañca satibalena iṇdriyavijayo diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikambilaṃ kalyāṇajātamupajanayati,
anya-e1206n0:54_7: iṇdriyavijayo ca sambhavati guruvuddhopasevāya tabbavanamavirādhetvā paṭipajjato,
anya-e1206n0:54_8: tasmā tayā āpāṇapariyantaṃ vatthuttayasaraṇaparāyaṇatā na pahātabbā.
anya-e1206n0:55_1: passatū hi kalyāṇābhinivesi cakkhūṇdriyalāḷana paravasassa salabhassa samujjalita dīpasikhāpatanaṃ sotiṇdriya
anya-e1206n0:55_2: sukhānuyuttassa taruṇa harīṇassa usu pātasammukhībhavanaṃ ghāṇiṇdriya paravasassa madhukarassa madavāraṇakaṇṇatālabhannaṃ
anya-e1206n0:55_4: baṇdhanāpāyaṃ imehi iṇdriyehi militehi ekassa kāmino sadideva pañcannaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:55_6: Imāni ca subhāsitāni paccavekkhatu anukkhaṇaṃ vicakkhaṇo.

anya-e1206n0:103_0: Sukhañca na vinā dhammaṃ tasmā dhammaparo bhavā’ti.

anya-e1206n0:104_2: mukhena vā disācikkhittacakkhunā ca ahaṅkāraparavasena gajanimilitamubbhāvayatā vā attano paññādhikkhepamivaca
anya-e1206n0:104_4: tappoṇena sirasā ca pīti samudita sādhuvādavikasitakapolenamukhena ca.
anya-e1206n0:104_5: Sakalāvayavacitthaṭaromañca kañcukitena dehena ca bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā dīghappamāṇa pamāṇa māvarattāmaggaphalalābhatoviya
anya-e1206n0:106_1: Tato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttapaṭipadaṃ avirādhetvā samāvaraṇena santuṭṭho tassa saṅghabodhi samaññaṃ gopetukāmo
anya-e1206n0:107_1: Lakkhaṇapāṭhakānaṃ vacanaṃ saddahanto bhāgineyyaṃ pabbajitukāmampi apabbājetvā “idha vāsato anurādhapure vāsoyeva kumārassa yogakkhemāvaho,
anya-e1206n0:107_2: puññānurūpena jāyamānassa vipākassa ca ṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e1206n0:107_3: mahācetiyassa vattapaṭivattasamācaraṇenaca mahanto puññakkhaṇdho sampajissati”ti maññamāno taṃ kumāramādāya
anya-e1206n0:107_5: Saṅghatissogoṭhābhayoti ca lambakaṇṇā rāja kumārā aparepi duce tassa paṃsukīḷanato paṭṭhāya sahāyātena
anya-e1206n0:107_6: kumārena saddhiṃ nikkhamiṃsu te tayo kumāre ādāya gacchanto mahāthero puretarameva anurādhapuraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1206n0:107_7: Mahātheramanugacchantesu tesu kumāresu jeṭṭho saṅghatisso majjhimo saṅghabodhi kaniṭṭho goṭhābhayoti
anya-e1206n0:107_8: te theraṃ pacchato anugacchantā tayopi paṭipāṭi yā tissavāpiyā setumatthakena gacchanti.
anya-e1206n0:108_1: Tattha setusālāya nisinno koci aṇdhovicakkhaṇo tesaṃ tiṇṇantaṃ kumārānaṃ padaviññāsaddaṃ sutvā lakkhaṇānusārena
anya-e1206n0:108_2: upaparikkhipitvā “ete tayopi sīhaḷadīpe pathavissarā bhavissantī”ti tattha nisinnānaṃ vyākāsi.
anya-e1206n0:108_3: Taṃvacanaṃ pacchā gacchanto goṭhābhayo sutvā itaresaṃ gacchantānaṃ anivedayitvā paccāgamma “katamo ciraṃ rajjaṃ kāressati?
anya-e1206n0:108_5: Pucchitvā pacchimoti vutte haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo sīghataraṃ āgamma tehi saddhiṃ gacchanto tikhiṇa
anya-e1206n0:108_6: mantitāya gambhīrabhāvato ca kañci ajānāpetvā antopuraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1206n0:108_7: Te tayopi patirūpe nivāse vāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:109_1: Atha kaniṭṭho “ete dvepi appāyukattā rajje patiṭṭhitāpi na ciraṃ jīvanti kira ahameva tesaṃ rajjaṃ dupessāmi”ti
anya-e1206n0:109_2: tadanurūpena upāyenapaṭijjanto tesaṃ rajjalābhāya upāyaṃ dassento abhiṇhaṃ matteti.
anya-e1206n0:109_3: Jeṭṭhopi tasmiṃ atipiyāsamāno tenopadiṭṭhameva samācarantorājānaṃ disvā laddha sammāno sabbesu rājakiccesu
anya-e1206n0:109_4: pubbaṅgamo hutvā na cirasseva rājavallabho ahosi?
anya-e1206n0:109_5: Tasmiṃ kāle rajjaṃ kārento vijaya rājā nāma khattiyo tasmiṃ pasanno sabbesu rājakiccesu tamameva padhānabhūtaṃ katvā senāpatiṃ akāsi.
anya-e1206n0:110_1: Dhammiko pana rajjena anatthikatāya rajjalābhāya cittampi anuppādetvā kevalaṃ mahātherassa anusāsanamatteneva
anya-e1206n0:110_2: rājupaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ anucaraṇamattamācaranto rājagehaṃ pavisitvā tato tehi saddhiṃ nikkhamma sāyaṃ mahā
anya-e1206n0:110_3: therassa vihāreyeva vasanto attano dhammikānuṭṭhānaṃ ahāpetvā mahācetiyo paṭṭhānagilānupaṭṭhānādikaṃ
anya-e1206n0:111_0: Tadā saṅghatisso sakalarajjañca purañca attanohatthagataṃ katvā ekasmiṃ dine laddhokāso rājānaṃ antobhavaneyeva
anya-e1206n0:113_1: Atha goṭhābhayo dhammikaṃ anicchāmānampi senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā āyatiṃ apekkhamāno sayaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko ahosi.
anya-e1206n0:113_2: Atha saṅghatisso rājā bahuṃ puññca apuññca pasavanto jambuphalapākakāle saseno sāmacco sabhorodho abhiṇhaṃ pācīna desaṃ gantvā jambuphalāni khādati.
anya-e1206n0:113_3: Rañño yebhuyyena gamanā gamanena upaddutā raṭṭhavāsino rājupabhogārahesu jambuphalesu visaṃ yojesuṃ.
anya-e1206n0:113_4: Atha so saṅghatisso rājā tena visena tattheva kālamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:114_1: Atha goṭhābhayo aṇdhavicakkhaṇassa vacanaṃ anussaranto anukkamena rajjaṃ dāpetvā pacchā ahaṃ suppatiṭṭho
anya-e1206n0:114_2: bhavissāmi’ti maññamāno sāmacco saseno saṅghabodhikumāraṃ rajjena nimantesi.
anya-e1206n0:114_3: So temiya mahābodhisattena diṭṭhādīnavattā rajjasukhāpariccāgānubhūtaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhajālaṃ anussaritvā
anya-e1206n0:114_4: punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipiyeva abhayo gāmanigamarājadhānīsu sabbepi manusse sannipātetvā tehi
anya-e1206n0:114_6: Atha sabbepi raṭṭhavāsino sāmaccāmahāvihāraṃ gantvā mahā saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā saṅgha majjhe saṅghabodhikumāro
anya-e1206n0:114_7: mahā saṅghaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajja namassitvā laddhokāso ekamantaṃ nisīditvā evaṃ vattumārabhī.
anya-e1206n0:115_2: tathā tathā kappuradīpasikheva kajjilaṃmalinameva kammajātaṃ kevalamubbamati.
anya-e1206n0:115_5: parāmāsadhumalekhā sucarita cittakammassa vibbhamaseyyā mohaniddānaṃ timiruggati paññādiṭṭhīnaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:115_15: nahi taṃ passāmi yohi aparicitāyāpi etāya nibbharamupagulho na vippaladdho, apica,
anya-e1206n0:115_16: abhisekasamaye rājaññānaṃ maṅgalakalasajalehi viya vikkhālanamupayāti dakkhiññaṃ aggihutatadhumeneva
anya-e1206n0:115_17: malinībhavati hadayaṃ purohita kusagga samajjatena viya apaniyate titikkhā,
anya-e1206n0:115_18: uṇhīsa paṭṭa baṇdhanena viya chādīyatī jarāgamadassanaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:115_20: cāmarapavanena viya duramuddhuyate saccāditā vettalatāppahārena viya duramapayanti sagguṇā eke rajjasiri
anya-e1206n0:115_21: madirā madamattā sakatthanipphādanaparehi dhanapisitāghāsagijjhehi sahānalīnībakehi dūtaṃ vinodananti,
anya-e1206n0:115_29: serībhāvaṃ paṇḍiccāmiti vaṇdijana navacanaṃ yaseṃghosoti taralatā ussāhoti.
anya-e1206n0:115_31: Eva dosagaṇampi guṇapakkhe ajjhāropayantehi sayampi anto ha santehi patāraṇakusalehi dhuttehi amānusocitāhi thomānāhi patāriyamānā,
anya-e1206n0:115_32: cittamadamatta cittā nicceta na tāya tatheti attani ajjhāropayantā alikābhimānaṃ maccadhammasamānāpi

anya-e1206n0:115_35: Atta milambanañca anu jīvijanena karīyamānaṃ abhinaṇdanti.
anya-e1206n0:116_1: Mānasā devatājjhāropaṇappatāraṇa sambhūta sambhāvano pahatañca anto paviṭṭha aparabhujayugaṃ viya attano bāhuyugaṃ sambhāvayanti.
anya-e1206n0:116_3: alikasambhāvanābhimānabharitā na namassanti devatāyo na pūjayanti samaṇa brāhmaṇe na mānayantī mānanīye,

anya-e1206n0:116_8: dosānaṃ mākara bhūtaṃrajjīvibhavaṃ ayaṃ na icchāmī’ti avoca.
anya-e1206n0:117_1: Atha mahājanena sādara majjhesito mahāsaṅgho kumārabhimukho hutvā “mahābhāgadheyya! Thanacucuke laggitājaluka
anya-e1206n0:117_3: dārako pana komalena mukhapuṭenamātu sukhasaññaṃ uppādayanto khīrameva avheti.
anya-e1206n0:118_1: Evameva rajjavibhavaṃ patto adhīro bālo bahuṃ apuññameva sañciṇāni,
anya-e1206n0:118_2: medhāvi dhirapuriso pana āyusaṅkhārassa dubbalattañca dhanasañcayassa nissārattañca paññāya upa parikkhitvā
anya-e1206n0:118_3: dasa kusalakammāni pūrento tādisena mahatā bhogakkhaṇdhena mahantaṃ kusalarāsiṃ upaciṇāti,
anya-e1206n0:118_5: etādisaṃ puññāyatanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhā dhammena samena lokaṃ paripālento sugatasāsanaṃ paggaṇhanto dānapāramikoṭippattaṃ
anya-e1206n0:118_6: katvā pacchā abhinikkhamaṇañca karonto bodhipakkhiyadhamme paripācehī”ti anusāsi.
anya-e1206n0:119_1: Atha so mahajjhāsayo purisavaro mahāsaṅghassa anusāsaniṃ madditu masamaṇtho adhivāsesī.
anya-e1206n0:119_2: Anantarañca mahājanakāyo saṅghassa anuññāya sakalaṃ sīladīpaṃ ekacchattaṃ katvā abhisiñciya dhammika

anya-e1206n0:131_1: So rājā mahā vihāre mahaggha mahāvisālaṃ salākaggaṃ kārāpetvā anekasahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccaṃ salāka bhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1206n0:131_2: Mātulamahātherassaṃca sakanāma dheyyena mahantaṃ pariveṇa vihāraṃ kārāpetvā anekehi kappiyabhaṇḍehi saddhiṃ
anya-e1206n0:131_3: saparivāra veṇā kāni gāmakkhettāni saṅasaparibhogārahāni katvā dāpesi sattameva nisīthakāle rahogato
anya-e1206n0:131_4: mahābodhisattassa dukkaracaritāni sallakkhento tādisāpadānaṃ attani sampādetumāsiṃsi. Tathā hi
anya-e1206n0:137_0: Evamamhākaṃ bodhisattassa viya bāhira vatthupariccāgamahussavo kadā me bhavissatiti ca,
anya-e1206n0:142_0: Dukkhaṃ na tassa hadayaṃ vata pīḷayittha.
anya-e1206n0:143_0: Evaṃ kirassa mahāsattassa maṃsa lohitādi ajjhattikavatthudānasamaye dukkhavedanā manaṃ na sambādhesi.
anya-e1206n0:143_1: Mamāpi īdisaṃ ajjhattika dānamahāmaṅgalaṃ kadā bhavissatīti ca.
anya-e1206n0:149_0: Evaṃ sīla rakkhanāpadānasiriṃ kadā viṇdāmīti ca,
anya-e1206n0:155_0: Evaṃ mayāpi acirasseva avassaṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ kātabbanti ca,
anya-e1206n0:161_0: Evaṃvidhā kalyānañāṇasampatti kadā me samijjhissatīti ca,
anya-e1206n0:165_0: Taṃ muddhatāya na bhave matiyā mahanyā,
anya-e1206n0:167_0: Evaṃ vidhāya vīriyapāramiyā kadā bhājanaṃ bhavissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:173_0: Evaṃ vidhāya khattipāramiyā attānaṃ kadā alaṃkarissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:179_0: Ahampi īdisena saccapāramitābalena sabbalokassa catu saccāva bodhana samattho kadā bhavissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:185_0: Evaṃ ma māpi adhiṭṭhāna pāramitāya pāripūrī kadā bhavissatīti ca
anya-e1206n0:191_0: Ahampi evaṃvidhāya mettāpāramitāya koṭippatto kadā bhavissāmīti ca.
anya-e1206n0:197_0: Evaṃ ahappi upakkhāpāramitāya kadā sabbasādhāraṇobhavissāmiti ca niccaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1206n0:199_0: 56. Evamanavajjadhammena rajjaṃ kārente tasmiṃ kadāci kenacipajānaṃ akusala vipākena-
anya-e1206n0:204_2: ye ye manussā tamāgamma taṃ rattakkhamudikkhanti tesaṃ akkhini rattāni bhavanti.
anya-e1206n0:204_3: Taṃ khaṇeyeva rattakkhamārako nāma jararogo pātubhavitvā māreti.
anya-e1206n0:205_2: Taṃ yakkhaṃ adasvāpi ye ye narā tenāturā te te passanti,
anya-e1206n0:205_4: Evaṃ na cironavayakkhabhayena rogena ca janapado viralajano jāto.
anya-e1206n0:206_1: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvāmayi rajjaṃ kārente pajānaṃ īdisassa bhayassa uppajjana ananucchavikanti maññamāno
anya-e1206n0:206_2: tadaheva aṭṭhaṃga sīlaṃ svādiyitvā attanā niccaṃ karīyamānāni dasakusalakammāni anussaritvā ahaṃ dhammavijayi
anya-e1206n0:206_3: bhavissāmīti taṃrakkhasaṃ ādisvā na uṭṭhahissāmīti daḷhataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya vāsagabbhe sayi.
anya-e1206n0:206_4: Tassa tena ācāra dhammatejena rājānubhāvena ca so rakkhaso santatto uttasitvā khaṇampi ṭhātuṃ asahanto
anya-e1206n0:206_5: ākāsenā gantvā balavapaccusa samaye antogabbhaṃ pavisitumasakkonto bāhire ṭhatvā rañño attānaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1206n0:206_8: ahaṃ khaṇampi ṭhātuṃ asakkonto tavānubhāvena baddhoviyahutvā idhānīto?
anya-e1206n0:207_1: Atha rājā sayanato vuṭṭhahitvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā oloketvā are! Jamma! Mma visayagate manusse kasmā?
anya-e1206n0:207_3: Mahārāja tava visaye mayā māretvā ekopi khādito natthi,
anya-e1206n0:207_6: atthi ce rājadaṇḍo mayi vidhīyatū’ti vatvā pavedhamāno niccalabhāvena ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhayavegena jātalomahaṃso sānunayameva māha.
anya-e1206n0:207_7: “Devassa raṭṭhaṃthitaṃ dhanadhañña samiddhisampuṇṇaṃ devassa dhana vassena sampuṇṇamāno rathā manussā,
anya-e1206n0:207_9: aha mīdisaṃ raṭṭhaṃ patvāpi aladdhagocaro aparipuṇṇamanoratho jato pipāsitova hutvā dīna bhāvena jīvikaṃ kappemi,
anya-e1206n0:207_10: tathā īdisaṃ bhayaṃ pattomhi abhayaṃ me dehi mahārājā’ti.
anya-e1206n0:208_1: Atha rājā tassa dīnavacanaṃ sutvā karuṇāya kampitahadayo “mā bhāyitvaṃ rakkhasa! Abhayaṃ te dammi icchitaṃ tevadā”ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:208_2: Evaṃ raññoca rakkhassaca aññamaññehi saddhiṃ sallapannānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā antogatā anucarā rājānaṃ parivāresuṃ,
anya-e1206n0:208_3: atha kathānukathāya rakkhaso “agato raññā saddhiṃ sallapatī”ti sutvā sabbe amaccā ca nāgarā ca senā ca
anya-e1206n0:208_4: sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇañca rāja bhavanañca pūretvā aruṇe uggacchante mahantaṃ kolāhalamakaṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:209_1: Atha sorakkhaso sannipatitaṃcaturaṅgabalañca āyudha hatthaṃ aneka sahassayodhabalañca disvā ativiyabhīto
anya-e1206n0:209_2: ṭhātuñca rañño āṇattibalena gattuñca kimapi bhāṇituñca na sakkoti,
anya-e1206n0:209_3: rājā tadavatthaṃ taṃ disvā laddhābhayosi imacchitaṃ te kathehī’ti āha,
anya-e1206n0:209_4: dhammiko rājā na me kiñci bhayaṃ uppādessatiti ñatvā rājānameva māha “devo jānātiyeva sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ āharaṭṭhitikataṃ,
anya-e1206n0:209_5: tathāhi uddhalokavāsino deva sudhābhojanena pīṇitā jīvanti,
anya-e1206n0:209_6: adhe lokavāsine nāgā bhekabhojanena suhitā vasanti manussā khajjakādinānāvidhena āhārajātena pīṇitā jīvanti.
anya-e1206n0:209_7: Amhādisā yakkha rakkhasādayo pana maṃsalohi sassādato tussanti?
anya-e1206n0:209_8: Tesvaha maññataro chāte ca pipāsite ca tādisaṃ karuṇāparāyaṇaṃ mahāpurisaṃ disvāpi aparipuṇṇamanorato maṇdabhāgadheyyo socāmī”ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:210_1: Tanutcamavoca “matakalebarāni khāditvā vasāmi“ti saccaṃ mahārāja! Matasarīraṃ sukkhapaṇṇaṃ viya nīrasaṃ
anya-e1206n0:210_2: kiṃ metāya dujjavikāya pasīda deva! Varaṃ me dehi nava visayethita manusso eko janapado gocaratthāya
anya-e1206n0:210_4: tattha manussānaṃ anapagatuṇhavegaṃ jīvarudhirañca jīvamaṃ sañca khāditvā ciraṃ sukhena jīvituṃ sakkā’ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:210_5: Atha rājā arepāpima! Rakkhasa! Nāhaṃ pāṇavadhaṃ anujānissāmi cajetaṃ tava gāhavikāranti.
anya-e1206n0:210_7: Jīvabalimekampi na demīti vutte “sacca menaṃ maṃdisāna kappa rukkhāpi avakesino jāyantīti hā hatosmi
anya-e1206n0:210_8: kimahaṃ karomī”ti visāda dinnayano dummukho domanassappatto appaṭihāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1206n0:211_1: Atha tassa nariṇdassa karuṇābhūyasi tahiṃ jāyamānā manotassa viratyā vyākulaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1206n0:217_1: Etassa rakkhassa paresaṃ dukkhamā pādayituṃ na kadāci sakkā,
anya-e1206n0:217_5: mama maṃsalohitena etaṃ santappayāmīti kata nicchayo amacce āmantetvā evamāha.
anya-e1206n0:222_0: Ato paraṃ kiṃ piya matthi mayhaṃ.
anya-e1206n0:223_0: Amaccā evamāhaṃsu ekassa rakkhassa atthāya sakala lokaṃ anāthikattu micchato koyaṃ dhamma maggo devassa atha rājā evamāha.
anya-e1206n0:229_1: Apetha tumhe na me dānantarāyaṃ karothā’ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:229_2: Atha amaccā yadicāyaṃ nicchayo apariccajanīyo amhesu ekeka meva dine dine rakkhassa balikammāya hotūti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:229_3: Atha rājā “ahameva jīvanto evaṃ nānājānissāmi”ti sallakattaṃ sīghaṃ ettha ānehīti saṃvidhahi.
anya-e1206n0:229_4: Atha tattha samāgatā sabbe janā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa guṇe anurattā sokena kampamānā tahiṃ patiṭṭhitena
anya-e1206n0:229_5: paṭighena ati kuddhā visuṃ visuṃ evamāhaṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:230_2: kāla megha sadisa metassa mahā sarīraṃ aneka satānaṃ sarānaṃ tuṇirabhāvaṃ netumarahatīti keci,
anya-e1206n0:230_3: anekesaṃ khepana satthānaṃ lakkhabhāvaṃ mupanetuṃ yuttamiti ca pare,
anya-e1206n0:230_4: asikadalikīlāya vajjhoyamiti aññño telacolena veṭhetvā mahatā pāvakena ujjāletvā dahitabboyamiti apare,
anya-e1206n0:230_6: Imaṃ asappurisaṃ jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā rajjūhi guḷapiṇḍaveṭhanaṃ veṭhetvā baṇdhanāgāre pakkhipi tabbanti
anya-e1206n0:230_7: aññe evamevaṃ tattha bahudhā kathentānaṃ kaṭukataraṃ vadhavidhānaṃ yakkho sutvā tasito militakkhamatadeho
anya-e1206n0:230_9: atha so rājā “ehi sakhe rakkhasa! Mahopakāra karaṇa bhūta!
anya-e1206n0:236_0: Vatvā “mama sarīrato dīyamānaṃ jīvamaṃsaṃ jīvarudhirañca mayi anuggahena sampaṭicchā’ti rakkhassa vatvā
anya-e1206n0:237_1: Atha so yakkho ubho kaṇṇe pidhāya santaṃ pāpaṃ paṭihatamamaṃgalaṃ rañño sotthi bhavatu,
anya-e1206n0:237_2: kimidamāpatitaṃ mahatā me pāpa vipākena jīvatu micchato visabhojanamicca,
anya-e1206n0:237_3: ātapatilantassa dāvaggi parikkhepo viya ca yadi īdiso me saṃkappa mahārāje samujjo yeyya deva daṇḍo me sirasi addhā patatūti,
anya-e1206n0:237_4: lokapālāpi me sīsaṃ chiṇdanti nāha mevaṃ vidhamaparādhaṃ karissāmī’ti na sampaṭicchi,
anya-e1206n0:238_1: Atha rājā tena hi yakkha! “Kiṃ te mayā kātabbantī’ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:238_2: Atha so rakkhaso mahājanānaṃ vadha vidhānena rañño ānāya ca bhīto santatto “deva! Nāha maññaṃ patthayāmi
anya-e1206n0:238_3: kintu itoppabhūti rājārahena bhojanena gāme gāme upahārabaliṃ laddhukāmomhi’ti āha atha rājā “evaṃ karontu
anya-e1206n0:238_4: raṭṭhavāsino”ti nagareva sakala raṭṭhe ca bheriṃ carāpetvā pānātipāta viramaṇāya ovaditvā naṃ yakkhaṃ uyyojesi.
anya-e1206n0:240_0: Atha kadāci vassādhikatānaṃ devatānaṃ pamādena avaggaho pāturahosi.
anya-e1206n0:256_1: Evaṃ mahatā gimhavipphuraṇena nadītaḷākasobbhādīsu sikatākaddamāvasesaṃ sositesu kedāresu mata sassesu
anya-e1206n0:256_2: bahudhā eḷitabhūmibhāgesu salilabhāvena kilantesu migapakkhisu taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rāja karuṇāya kampitahadayo
anya-e1206n0:256_3: aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ samādiyitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇamāgamma yāva devo sabbattha vittha tāhi saliladhārāhi sakala
anya-e1206n0:256_4: laṅkādīpaṃ pinento vassaṃ vassitvā mahatā udakappavāhena maṃ na plavayissati maramānopi tāva na uṭṭhahissāmīti
anya-e1206n0:257_1: Taṃkhaṇe tassa raññe dhammatejena cakitānaṃ guṇappabaṇdhena ca pasantānaṃ devanāgayakkhānaṃ ānubhāvena samantato vassavalāhakā uṭṭhahiṃsu tathā hi.
anya-e1206n0:282_1: Evaṃvidhe vasse pavattesi rājā namaṃ mahogho uppilāpadhīti na uṭṭhāsiyeva atha amaccā cetiyaṅgaṇe jalaniggamapaṇāliyo
anya-e1206n0:282_3: Atha so uṭṭhāya cetiyassa mahussavā vidhāya rājabhavanameva gato.
anya-e1206n0:283_1: Tato adaṇḍena asatthena rajjamanusāsato rañño accantamudramānasattaṃ viditvā unnaḷā keci manussā gāmavilopādikaṃ
anya-e1206n0:283_2: ācarantā corā ahesuṃ taṃ sutvā rājā te core jīvagāhaṃ gāhāpetvā baṇdhanāgāre khipitvā rahasi tesaṃ ratanahiraññādikaṃ
anya-e1206n0:283_3: datvā mā evaṃ karothāti ovaditvā palāpetvā rattiyaṃ āmakasusānato chavarūpe ānetvā corahiṃsaṃkārento
anya-e1206n0:283_4: viya agginā uttāpetvā nagarato bahi khipāpesi evaṃ corabhayadva apanetvā ekadā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1206n0:284_2: indaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sakosaṃ saparajanaṃ sahorodhaṃ sāmaccaṃ sakhavāhanaṃ rajjaṃ kassaci dānarūpena datvā
anya-e1206n0:284_3: vanaṃ pavisitvā sīlaṃ samādāya kāyavivekaṃ cittavivekadva sampādetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhinikkhamane ratiṃ janesi.
anya-e1206n0:284_5: Esa rājā dhammiko sadācārakusalo patidivasaṃ vīdhīyamānehi dasavidhakusalakammehi āyusaṃkhāropissa vaḍḍhati upapīḷakakammānica dūramapayanti.
anya-e1206n0:284_6: Tatoyeva cirataraṃ jīvissati etassa accayena kadāhaṃ rajjaṃ labhissāmi rajjaṃ patvāpi vaḍataro āhaṃ yuvajanasevanīyaṃ
anya-e1206n0:284_7: visayasukhaṃ kathamanubhavissāmi sīghamimaṃ ito palāpetvā rajje patiṭhahissāmīti cintetvā bahuṃ sāradhanamādāya
anya-e1206n0:284_8: uttaradvārato nikkhamitvā pubbacore sannipātetvā balakāyaṃ gahetvā āgamma nagaradvāraṃ gaṇhi taṃ pavattiṃ
anya-e1206n0:284_9: sutvā rājā “rajjaṃ kassacidatvā abhinikkhamanaṃ karissāmiti katasanniṭṭhānassa mama ayaṃ kenaci devānubhāvena
anya-e1206n0:284_10: sannidhāpito maññe amaccā mayaṃ ananumatāpi purāyujjhitumāra bhanti evaṃ sati maṃ nissāya ubhayapakkhagatassa
anya-e1206n0:284_11: mahājanassa vipulaṃ dukkhaṃ “bhavissati kimanena rajjena phalaṃ rajjaṃ tasseva dinnaṃ hotu”ti vatvā kaṃci
anya-e1206n0:284_12: ajānāpetvā parissāvanamattaṃ gahetvā dullakkhiyamānaveso dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā malayadesaṃ gacchanto
anya-e1206n0:288_1: Iti cintayanto kamena gantvā hatthavanagallaṃ nāma mahantaṃ araññāyantaṃ pāvisi,
anya-e1206n0:288_3: kāmalaka bharīta katirīṭakasālasaralavakula punnāga nāgakandambakāsoka nīpacampaka bhintālatālappabhūtihi
anya-e1206n0:288_6: sukhopabhogaramaṇīya taṃ mahā kānnaṃ oloketvā idaṃ me tapovanaṃ bhavitumarahatiti katālayo kāyavivekacittavivekānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:288_7: lābhena ekaggamānaso mettāvihāramanuyujantovaññajīvikāya saṃjanitasantosavippharaṇapinītakāyo vāsaṃ kappeti.
anya-e1206n0:290_1: Goṭhābhayopi rajjaṃ patvā katipāhaccayena “mama caṇḍatāya vīratto pajāvaggo manaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ saṅghabodhiṃ
anya-e1206n0:290_2: ānetvā rajjaṃ kāretuṃ kadāci ussahatī”ti saṃjātaparisaṅko taṃ mārāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhisaṇdhāya “saṅghabodhirañño
anya-e1206n0:290_3: yo sīsaṃ ānessati tassa sahassaṃ pāritosikadhananti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi.
anya-e1206n0:290_4: Tato malayadesasiko koci duggatapuriso attano kaccena puṭabhatta ādāya vana maggena gacchanto bhojana
anya-e1206n0:290_5: velāya soṇḍisamīpe nisinnaṃ saṅghabodhirājānaṃ disvā tassa ākappena pasannahadayo bhattena taṃ nimantesi
anya-e1206n0:290_7: So purisonāhaṃ nihīna jātiyaṃ jāto na pāṇavadhaṃ jivikāya jīvanto kevaṭṭo vā luddako vā bhavāmi atha
anya-e1206n0:290_8: ko uttama vaṇṇehi paribhogārahe vaṃse sañjātomhi mama santakamidaṃ bhattaṃ bhottumarabhati kallyāṇa dhammikoti
anya-e1206n0:292_0: Chāyaya gehaṃ sādhāya seyyaṃ vatthaṃ tacenaca;
anya-e1206n0:295_0: Evaṃ sampanna bhogassa na taṇhā parasantake;
anya-e1206n0:296_0: Tava jaccādimuddissa garahā mama na vijjatīti.
anya-e1206n0:298_1: Atha so puriso bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanamassamāno nibandhitva yāci.
anya-e1206n0:298_2: Tato tassa nibaṇdhanaṃ nivāretumasakkonto sagāravaṃ sopacāraṃ dīyamānaṃ bhattañca sakaparīssāvanaparīputapānīyañcā
anya-e1206n0:298_3: paribhuñjitvā hatthamukhadhovanena parisamatta bhatta kicco annohaṃ katupakāro kīdisamassa paccupakāraṃ
anya-e1206n0:298_4: karissāmiti cintayantova taṃ abhimukhīkariya “anurādhapure kā pavattī”ti pucchi,
anya-e1206n0:298_5: atha so puriso pubbarājānaṃ palāpetvā goṭhābhayo nāma rājā rajjepatiṭṭhahitvā siri saṅghabodhirañño yo
anya-e1206n0:298_6: sīsaṃ ādāya dasseti tasha sahassaṃ pāritosikadhananti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi kirāti suyati”ti.
anya-e1206n0:299_0: Tassa vacana samanantarameva tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhahadayo mama sahassārahasīsadānena idāni etassa paccupakāro
anya-e1206n0:299_1: kato bhavissati ajjhattikadānattā dānapāramitāva koṭippattā bhavissati idañca vatare-
anya-e1206n0:311_0: Cintetvā kataticchayo “bho purisa sobhaṃ pirī sirisaṅghabodhi rājānāma,
anya-e1206n0:311_1: mama sīsaṃ gahetvā gantvā rañño dassehī”ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:311_2: So taṃ sutvā “deva nāhamevaṃ vidhaṃ mahāpātaka kammaṃ āvajissāma bhāyāmi”ti āha.
anya-e1206n0:312_1: Atha rājā “mā bhāyi kahāpaṇasaggassalābhāya ahameva te upāsaṃ karissāmi kevalaṃ tvaṃ mayā vuttaniyāmeva
anya-e1206n0:312_2: paṭipajjā”ti vatvā sahassalābhagiddhena tena pathikapurisena adhivāsite sīsacchedāya satthaṃ alabhamāno
anya-e1206n0:312_3: dhammādhiṭṭhānateja sā sīsaṃ saṇdhito visuṃ karitvā dassāmīti cintetvā pallaṅkaṃ suṇthiraṃ baṇdhitvā
anya-e1206n0:312_4: mamedaṃ sīsadānaṃ sabbaññutañāṇa paṭilābhāya paccayo bhavatūti somanassapubbakaṃpatthanaṃ katvā taṃ purisaṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_6: So adhikapuriso pubbe adiṭṭhāsutapubbadukkarakamma dinnaṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā anurādhapuraṃ gantvā dissemi kotaṃ sañjānāti kotaṃ saddahissatīti,
anya-e1206n0:312_7: atha so goṭhābhayo sace tena saddahissati ahavettha sakkhihutvā sahassaṃ dāpessāmi tayātu tattha evaṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_8: kattabba”nti paṭipajjitabbā karaṃ upadisitvā ehisappurisa mma santike mbaṇato hutvā ubhayartthalānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_9: ekīkaraṇavasena añjaliṃ katvā bāhuṃ pasārehīti vatvāubhosu passesu nīlamaññāsamaññānaṃ nālinaṃ ujubhāvāpādanena
anya-e1206n0:312_10: kaṇḍhanāḷaṃ sammā ṭhapetvā salilaparissāvanne sīsasaṇdhiṃ jala lekhāya paricchaṇditvā sakena dakkhiṇa
anya-e1206n0:312_11: hatthamuṭṭhinā culābaddhaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā yāva mama sīraṃ ādāya addhikaṃ purisassa hatthe samappemi
anya-e1206n0:312_12: tāva mama cittakiriya vāyo dhātuvego avicchinno pavattatūti adhiṭṭhāya cuḷābaddhaṃ uddhābhimukhaṃ ukkhipi.
anya-e1206n0:312_13: Tāvadeva sīsabaṇdho puthubhūto hutvā tena dakkhiṇa hattha muṭṭhināgahitoyeva paggharantiyā lohitadhārāya saddhi addhikassahatthatāle patiṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1206n0:312_14: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe vanādhivatthā devatā sādhuvādamukharā pupphavassaṃ vassāpetvā sīsassa ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:318_1: Atha so addhikapuriso sugaṇdhavana kusuma mālāhi taṃ sīsaṃ alaṃkaritvā pugakuhulikāpuṭe pakkhipitvā sīghagati
anya-e1206n0:318_3: so taṃ disvā sañjanitu masakkonto saṃsayappatto aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1206n0:318_4: Atha addhikapuriso raññā vuttavidhi manussaranto taṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā ākāse khipitvā “sāmi! Sirisaṅghabodhimahārāja!
anya-e1206n0:318_5: Tva mettha me sakkhibhavā”ti añjalimpaggahetvā ākāsa muddikkhamāno yāci,
anya-e1206n0:318_6: atha taṃ devatādhiggahitaṃ sīsaṃ nirālambe ambare laddha patiṭṭhaṃ goṭhābhayassa abhimukhaṃ hutvā.
anya-e1206n0:322_0: Tvaṃ cāsi rajja sirilābha sukhena deva,
anya-e1206n0:324_1: Taṃ sutvā goṭhābhayo sāmacco vimbhītahadayo sīhāsanaṃ sajjetvā upari setacchattaṃ kāretvā idha deva!
anya-e1206n0:324_2: Otarāti yācitvā tattha otiṇṇaṃ taṃ sīsaṃ nānāvidhāhi pūjāhi ārādhetvā namassamāno khamāpetvā mahatā mahena
anya-e1206n0:324_3: āḷāhanakiccaṃ kāretvā aṅikaṃ kahāpaṇasahassena tosetvā uyyojesi.
anya-e1206n0:326_1: Sirisaṅghabodhi rañño mahesī pana rañño palātabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ahañca taṃ anubbajāmi”ti aññatara vesena
anya-e1206n0:326_2: dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā maggaṃ ajānanni ujukamaggaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā sāmikaṃ apassantī
anya-e1206n0:326_3: bhayena sālintāya ca pacchitumpi asahamānā malaya desa meva gatoti cintetvā vaṅkamaggena gacchantī komalatāya
anya-e1206n0:326_4: sīghaṃ gantumasakkonti kālaṃ yāpetvā tassa araññāyatanassa samīpagāmasmiṃ raññosisadānappavattiṃ sutvā
anya-e1206n0:326_5: “sā haṃ varākī dassanamattampi nālattha”nti soka paripuṇṇahadayā tameva vanasaṇḍaṃ adhiruyha bhattuno
anya-e1206n0:326_6: kalebaraṃ vicinantī samīpagāmesu mahajanaṃ pucchanti avandinasaṅiketattā tattha tattha vicarantī samīpagāmavāsino
anya-e1206n0:326_7: bālakā gopālakā kaṭṭhabhārikā itthiyo ca etissā vilāpaṃ sutvā kampita hadayā tāya saddhiṃ vicarantī.
anya-e1206n0:326_8: Sā evaṃ cilūpamānā bhīmiyaṃ supupphitaṃ vimalavālukaṃ vanagumbaṃ disvā tattha nipatitvā bhūmiyaṃ parivantamānā atikaruṇaṃ vilāpamakāsi,
anya-e1206n0:327_1: Sā mahatā rodante rodanena taṃrattiṃta ttheva khepetvā puna divase ito cito ca vicaranti mahatā sokagginā
anya-e1206n0:327_2: ḍayhamānā santāpaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonti ekasmiṃ khuddaka jalāsaye nipatitvā nimuggaṃyeva mucchāvegena
anya-e1206n0:327_3: dve tayo muhutte ativāhetvā upaladdhapaṭibodhā pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpesi,
anya-e1206n0:327_4: taṃ ṭhānametarahi ca “nibbāṇa pokkharaṇī”ti ca samaññaṃ alabhi.
anya-e1206n0:328_1: Tato uṭṭhahitvā anubhūmiṃ anurukkhaṃ anusilā talaṃ gavesamānā soṇḍi samīpe sayamānaṃ devatādhiggahena
anya-e1206n0:328_2: sigālādīhaanupahataṃ sukkhaṃ kavaṇdharūpaṃ disvā sokavega phalipataneva hadayena daḷhataraṃ taṃ aliṃgitvā sayi,
anya-e1206n0:328_3: tāva bhone vekallena durāgamanena tattha tattha nipatita sarīra ghātena ca nilanta rūpā mucchā samakālameva kālamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:329_1: Samīpagāma vāsino sannipatitvā muddhābhi sittassa rañño ca mahesiyā ca sarīraṃ amhādisehi phusituñca na yoggaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:329_2: vattamānassa rañño anivedayitvā āḷāhana kiccaṃ kātumpi na yuttanti sammanetatvā vassātapa nivāraṇāya
anya-e1206n0:329_3: kuṭiṃ katvā tiracchānappavesanisedhāya vatiñca katvā pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:330_1: Goṭhābhayo sirisaṅghabodhirājassa anañña sādhāraṇa guṇappabaṇdhaṃ anussaranto daharakālato paṭṭhāya vatthuttaya
anya-e1206n0:330_2: saraṇaparāyaṇataṃ niccaṃ sīlarakkhaṇaṃ sugatāgama vicikkhaṇattaṃ sakalakalākosallaṃ rajje anatthikataṃ
anya-e1206n0:330_3: dānasoṇḍa taṃ rakkhasadamanādikaṃ dukkaracaritakañca tassa nāma sacetanassa na pitimāvahati visesato
anya-e1206n0:330_4: “addhikaduggatassa sahassa lābhāya sahatthena sīsaṃ kaṇṭhanālato uddharitvā dānaṃ sīsassāpi nirālambe
anya-e1206n0:330_5: ākāse avaṭṭhānaṃvyattatarāya girāya sādhippāyañcetaṃ nivedanañceti acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ adhiṭṭhapubbaṃ
anya-e1206n0:330_6: assuta pubbañca nimmalacaritaṃ mama mahāparādhakalaṅike neva saddhiṃ cirakālaṃ pavattīssati,
anya-e1206n0:330_7: aho ahaṃ suciraṭṭhāyinā īdisena akittīsaddena sādhuhi niṇdaniyo bhavissāmi visesato pana niccakālaṃ kalyāṇa
anya-e1206n0:330_8: mittabhūtassa īdisassa mahānubhāvassa anaparedhassa mahāpurisassa rajjaṃ acchiṇditvā vadhaṃ kāresiṃ aññadatthu
anya-e1206n0:330_9: mittadubhikammena ahaṃ paḷiveṭhito bhavissāmi”ti cintettoyeva bhayasantā pehi nikkhanta sedo pavedhamāno
anya-e1206n0:331_1: Atha tassa daṇḍakammassa karaṇavasena uḷāraṃ taraṃ kusalakammaṃ kātabbanti paṭibhāyi.
anya-e1206n0:331_2: Atha so amacce sannipātetvā tehi saddhiṃ sammantetvā kata nicchayo mahā saṅgheneva tatheva anusiṭṭho
anya-e1206n0:331_3: mahatā balakāyena saddhiṃ gantvā tassa araññāyatanassa avidūre senāsannivesaṃ kāretvā tassa mahāpurisassa
anya-e1206n0:331_4: dukkarapadāna sakkhībhūtaṃ puññaṭṭhānaṃ sayameva gantvā soṇḍikā samīpe anurūpaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā attano
anya-e1206n0:331_5: rājānubhāvaṃ dassento āḷāhanaṭṭhānaṃ devanagaramiva alaṅkārāpetvā kevalehi mahantehi caṇdanadāruhi uccataraṃ
anya-e1206n0:331_6: citakaṃ kāretvā bhārena pamāṇena ca rañño sīsasadisaṃ jambonadakanakehi sakaṇṭha nāḷaṃ sīsākāraṃ sippihi
anya-e1206n0:331_7: kāretvā kavaṇdharūpe saṅghaṭitvā vividha ratana samujjalaṃ suvaṇṇakirīṭaṃ pilaṇdhāpetvā mahesiñca tatheva
anya-e1206n0:331_8: alaṃkaritvā te ubhopi kāghikavatthasadisehi mahaggha dukulehi acchādetvā anekaratanakhacitaṃ suvaṇṇasayanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:331_9: āropetvā caṇdana citakamatthake ṭhapetvā parisuddhajoti pāvakaṃ jāletvā aneka khattiyakumāraparivārito
anya-e1206n0:331_10: sayameva tattha ṭhatvā anekasappighaṭasatehi siñcitvā āḷāhana mahussavaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1206n0:332_1: Tatheva dūtiya divasepi mahatā jaṇena āḷāhanaṃ nibbāpetvā tasmiṃ ṭhane cetiya bhavanaṃ vaṭṭulākāretuṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_2: vaṭṭatīti cintetvā amacce āmantetvā etarahi anekabhūmikaṃ ativisālaṃ kanakamaya vaṭṭulagharaṃ kāretuṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_3: sakatā āyati parihārakānaṃ abhāvena nappavattati raṭṭhavilepakāpi suvaṇṇalobhena nāsenti tasmā alohanīyaṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_4: sukhaparihārārahaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ vaṭṭulagharañca cetiyañca nacirasseva kātuṃ yuttanti mantetvā mahābalakāyaṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_5: niyojetvā vuttaniyāmeneva dvibhumakaṃ vaṭṭula bhavanaṃ nimmāpetvā tassa abbhantare sugatadhātunidhānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_6: pūjanīyaṃ cetiyañca kārāpetvā mahussadivase mahāsaṅghassa taṃ dassetvā “eso bhante sirisaṅghabodhi mahārājā
anya-e1206n0:332_8: idāni mayā tassa rañño cetiyarūpassa kittimaya sarīrassa chattādhichattaṃ viya dvibhumakaṃ vaṭṭulavimānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_9: kāretvā cetiyasīse kirīṭaṃ viya kanakamayaṃ thūpikañca yojetvā sabbehi devamanussehi māna nīyataṃ caṇdanīyataṃva
anya-e1206n0:332_10: pāpito”ti vatvā cetiyagharassa anekāni gāmakkhettāni parosahassaṃ parivārajanaṃca niyādetvā pabbatapāde
anya-e1206n0:332_11: anekasatapāsāda pariveṇacaṅkamana rattiṭṭhāna divāṭṭhāna dhammasālāgopurapākārādi avayavasahite vividhe
anya-e1206n0:332_12: saṅghārāme kāretvā tattha vasantassa anekāni sahassassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ paccayalābhāya anekāni
anya-e1206n0:332_13: saparijanāni gāmakkhettāni datvā “mahā lekharaṭṭhassa samussitadhajāyamāno ayaṃ mahāvihārolaṅkā bhūmisāmikānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:332_14: khattiya janānaṃ kuladhanabhūto sabbehi khattiyehi aparihāpaniya vibhavo niccaṃ pālanīyo”ti mahājanakāyassa
anya-e1206n0:332_15: majjhe khattiya kumārānaṃ ādisitvā anurudhapuraṃ gatopi tasse ca pāpakammassa nirākaranāya tesu tesu
anya-e1206n0:332_17: tatoppabhūti laṅkādhipaccāmupagate hi khattiyehi mahā maccādīhi ca so hatthavanagallamahāvihāro antarattarā
anya-e1206n0:334_1: Athāparena samayena kadāci kasmiṃ vihāre nivasato mahā bhikkhusaṅghassa antare keci mahāthero ambhokāsiko
anya-e1206n0:334_2: hutvā antovihāre ekasmiṃ padese nisiditvā bhāvanamanuyujanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā mahāmedaniyā nigghosena
anya-e1206n0:335_1: Tadā upatisso nāma rājā rajjaṃ kārento nisīthasamaye bhayāvahaṃ taṃ pathavisaddaṃ sutvā kiṃ vā mebhavissatiti
anya-e1206n0:335_3: atha taṃ setacchattā dhivatthā devatā “mahāyi mahārāja! Ito kāraṇākidvite avamaṅgalaṃ natthi hatthavanagallamahāvihāre
anya-e1206n0:335_5: tassa arahattappattikāle pathaviniggosassa kāraṇaṃ kiṃtu vutte so thero pubbe puññakammaṃ karento ākāsena
anya-e1206n0:335_6: saddhiṃ pathaviṃ unnādetvā arahā bhaveyyanti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi tassa phalamidanti samassāsesi.
anya-e1206n0:336_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā avasesabhikkhūnaṃ arahatthappattito visiṭṭhataro tassa kilesavijayoti pasannahadayo taṃ
anya-e1206n0:336_2: mahātheraṃ namassitvā tassa asavakkhayassa mahussave āsanabhūtaṃ bhumippadesadva pāsādakaraṇavasena sammānissāmīti
anya-e1206n0:336_3: cintetvā mahābalakāyamādāya tattha gantvā tasmiṃ padese pañcabhūmakaṃ mahāpāsaṃ kāretvā vividha cittakammehi
anya-e1206n0:336_4: samalaṅkārāpetvā kanaka khacita tambamaya pattharehi chādetvā devavimānaṃ viya sajjetvā taṃ khīṇāsava
anya-e1206n0:336_5: mahāteraṃ sabhikkhusaṅghaṃ tattha vāsetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāpetvā saparijanāti gāmakkhettāni pāsādasantikāni
anya-e1206n0:337_1: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena malayadesavāsino keci corā ekato hutvā gāmavilopaṃ katvā mahantena dhanalābhenamattā
anya-e1206n0:337_2: dhanaṃ datvā balakāyaṃ uppādetvā yebhuyye serino hutvā mahanta mahante vihāreva vilumpannā suvaṇṇapattharacchadanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:338_1: Tadā moggallāno nāma rājā rajjaṃ kārento taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tesaṃ santike care pasetvā dānasāmabhedehi aññamaññaṃ bhiṇdi,
anya-e1206n0:338_2: te corā bhiṇdantā itaretarehi yujjhitvā sayameva dubbalā ahesuṃ,
anya-e1206n0:338_3: athaso rājā te asamagge ñatvā attano senaṃ gahetvā tattha gantvā te visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā niggayha raṭṭhe
anya-e1206n0:338_4: abhayabheriṃ carāpetvā janapadaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ katvā tehi apaviddhavihāre pākatike kāretvā mahāpāsādaṃ
anya-e1206n0:338_5: suvaṇṇa gaṇhanakāle pātesuṃ tī sutvā “pubbeviya suvaṇṇapattharehi chādito pacchāpi īdisi vipattijāyissatī”ti
anya-e1206n0:338_6: ñatvā tebhūmakaṃ kāretvā yathāpure pāsādaṃ nimmāpetvā mattikā pattharehi chādetvā vaṭṭulabhavanaṃ paṭisaṃkhāretvā
anya-e1206n0:340_1: Atha laṅkālaṅkārabhūtesu visālapuññiddhivikkamesu ratanattayamāmakesu anekesu laṅkānāthesu kittipuñjāvasesesu
anya-e1206n0:340_2: jātesu apetanītimaggesu rajjaparipānocitavidhānavirahitesu mudubhūkesvevāmaccajanesuca yebhuyyena aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1206n0:340_3: viruddhesu vattamānesu laṅkāvāsīnaṃ purākatena kenāpi dāruṇena pāpakammunā nānādesavāsinī aviditasatthusamayā
anya-e1206n0:340_4: paviṭṭhamicchādiṭhigahaṇā paccatthisenā jambudīpā idhāgamma sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ anekātaṅka saṅkulamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:341_1: Tadātāya paccatthisenāya gālhataraṃ nippiḷiyamānā rāja rāja mahāmattādayo anekasahassajanakāyā ca bhayavakitahadayāsakatāṇa
anya-e1206n0:341_2: gavesino jaḍḍitagāmanigamanagarā tattha tattha gariduggādo kicchena vāsaṃ kappesuṃ tato sugatadasanadhāturakkhādhikatā
anya-e1206n0:341_3: uttaramūḷavāyino mahāyatayo dantadhātudva pattadhātuvaradva gahetvā kunnamalayābhidhānaṃ giriduggaṃ duppavesaṃjanapadamupāgamma
anya-e1206n0:341_4: tatthāpi tampaṭijaggitumasamatthā bhūmiyaṃ nidabhitvā yathākāmaṃ gatā.
anya-e1206n0:342_1: Tato pubbe jayamahābodhidumiṇdena saha sakalajambudīpādhipatinā dinakarakulatilakena dhammāsokanariṇdena
anya-e1206n0:342_2: pesitānaṃ attanā samāna gottānaṃ rājaputtānaṃ nattapannatādiparamparāgatassa vijayamallanarādhipassa
anya-e1206n0:342_3: orasaputto vijayabāhu nariṇdā nāma rājā suciññātabbasamayantaro sattasamāciṇṇa sunītipatho sampannabalavāhano
anya-e1206n0:342_4: jambuddoṇiṃ nāma puravaraṃmāpetvā tattha vasanto mahatā balakāyena katasakalapaccatthivijayokunta malayabhūmippadesato
anya-e1206n0:342_5: bhagavato dantadhātubhaṭṭārakaṃ pattadhātuvarañca āharāpetvā surasandanasadisamativirocamānaṃ vimānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:342_6: māpetvā tasmiṃ taṃ dhātuyugaḷaṃ nivesetvā mahatā upahāravidhānā sādaramupaṭṭhahanto bhagavato caturāsītidhammakkhaṇdhane
anya-e1206n0:342_9: vaṭṭulavimānepurā raṭṭha vilopāgatāya colake raḷādikāya titthiyasenāyamahācetiyaṃ udare bhinnamatte jīvite
anya-e1206n0:342_10: viya dhātubhaṭṭārake antarahite hadayavatthumaṃsamīva suvaṇṇarantādikama paharitvā viddhastaṃ piṇṇudhāravidhīnā
anya-e1206n0:342_11: paṭisaṃvaronto pupphādhānatta yato paṭṭhāya sakkaccaṃ vināpetvā mahantaṃ suvaṇṇa thūpikāmabhadva kāretvā
anya-e1206n0:342_12: saparijanāni gāmakkhettādīni ca datvā tattha nivasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nibaddhadānavaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapetvā taṃ
anya-e1206n0:343_1: Atha tasmiṃ laṅkānāthe kittisarīrāvasese jāte tassa tujavaro parakkamabhujo nāmarājā amhākaṃ bhagavato
anya-e1206n0:343_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa bodhimūle nisīditvā mārabalaṃ vidhametvā sambodhirajjappattito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhasatādhikavassasahasse
anya-e1206n0:343_3: catuvīsatiyā ca vaccharesu atikkantesu sampattarajjābhiseko anekavidhasaṅgahavatthuhi saṅgahitamahājano
anya-e1206n0:343_5: maṇi rattasamubbhāsitaratanakaraṇḍakañca pañcahi suvaṇṇasahassehi sovaṇṇakaraṇḍakañca pañcavīsatiyā rajatasahassehi
anya-e1206n0:343_6: rajatakaṇḍakañca dāṭhādhātubhadantassa kārāpetvā atīca pasannahadayo suhumuttena tattha sampayanto attanonagarañca
anya-e1206n0:343_7: dhantadhātumaṇdirañca sakkañcaṃ samalaṅkārāpetvā bahumāna purassarodasanadhātuvaramādāya anekāni bhagavato
anya-e1206n0:343_8: cariyāpadānānī samanussaritvā purā nekabhupatayo pāṭihīrasaṇdassanena pasāditā iti pavattakathāmataraseneva
anya-e1206n0:343_9: me savanayugaḷaṃ paripīnitamadhunāpi kenaci pāṭihāriyavisesena mama cakkhupaṭilābho saphalo kātabboti
anya-e1206n0:344_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā dasanadhātu tassa karapaṅakaje rājahaṃsivilāsamātanvatī pāṭihīramakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:344_3: Yathā antimabhave mātu tucchito jātamattova bodhisatto naravarakaratopanītadukulacumbaṭakato otarantova
anya-e1206n0:344_4: bālo samānopi soḷasavassuddesiko viya amaṇḍitopi anekavatthābharaṇavibhusito viya bhūmiyā gacchantopi
anya-e1206n0:344_5: ākāsena gacchanto viya sabbesaṃ janānaṃ paṭihāsi,
anya-e1206n0:344_6: tatheva tattha tadā dantadhātubhaṭṭārako sugabimbā kāra salakkhaṇāvayavena rūpena bhāsamāno anekavidharaṃsinikare
anya-e1206n0:344_7: vikiranto tattha santipatitānaṃ janānaṃ mānanaṃ jānesi. Vuttañhi.
anya-e1206n0:355_5: attanopitumahārājato diguṇaṃlokasāsanasaṅgahaṃ karonto kadāci saṅghassa kaṭhinacīvarānidātukāmo kappāsaparikammakantanādikāni
anya-e1206n0:355_6: sabbakaraṇīyāni ekāheneva naṭṭhapetvā paccekamanekamahaggha garubhaṇḍamaṇḍitāni sasāmaṇikaparikkhārāni
anya-e1206n0:355_7: asītimattāni kaṭhinacīvarāni dāpetvā lokassa sādhuvādena dasadisaṃ pūresi.
anya-e1206n0:356_1: Evamaññānipi bahūni lokavimbhayakarāni puññapadānāni sampādento so parakkamabāhumahānariṇdo hatthavanagalla
anya-e1206n0:356_2: vihāre attano pitumahārañño āḷāhanaṭṭhāne mahācetiyaṃ baṇdhāpetvā tattheva aṇekakhīṇāsavasahassaparibhuttaṃ
anya-e1206n0:356_3: pāsādavaraṃ cirakāla cinaṭṭhaṃ sutvā dhanuketakivatthuvaṃse jātaṃ saddhādiguṇasampatti samuditaṃ patirājadeva
anya-e1206n0:356_4: nāmakaṃ amaccavaraṃ pesetvā tena anekasahassadhanapariccāgena bhumittitayamaṇḍitaṃ sumanobharaṃ pure
anya-e1206n0:356_5: piyataṃ pāsādaṃ kārāpetvā tattha nivasantānaṃ anekasaṃ bhikkhunaṃ nibaddha paccayadānaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e1206n0:357_1: Tattheva vaṭṭulavimānassa heṭṭhimatale gopānasiyo ṭhapetvā samantā chadanarūpaṃ kāretvā dvibhumakaṃ vimānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:357_2: tibhumakamakāsi tatthevalaṅkādīpe abhūtapubbaṃ jinamaṇdiraṃ kārāpetukāmo vaṭṭulavimānato uttaradisābhāge
anya-e1206n0:357_3: paṭhamaṃ porisappamāṇaṃ silātalapariyantaṃ khaṇitvā paṃsūni apanetvā nadīvālukāhi pūretvā kuñjararājavirājitaādhārabaṇdhakato
anya-e1206n0:357_4: paṭṭhāya yāva phupikaṃ aṭṭhaṃsavibhāgena bhitticchadanāni vibhattāni katvā paccekaṃ nānāvaṇṇavicittānamaṭṭhavidhānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:357_6: pamukhapariyante vividhacittarūpamanoharamuccataraṃ iḍhikāhi nivitaṃ katasudhāparikammaṃ makaratoraṇamaṇḍalañca
anya-e1206n0:357_7: nimminitvā antoviracitāti manoharamālākammalatā kammādi nānāvidha cittakamma samujjalaṃ suvihitasopānadvārakavāṭaṃ
anya-e1206n0:357_8: samalaṅkataṭṭhānalīḷhamanohara sajīvajinasaṃ kāsapaṭibimbarūpavibhūsitaṃ paṭibimbassa dakkhiṇato ghanasilāvihita
